title: The Excavation
subtitle: Field notes from the digital substrate

acts.title: The Awakening
acts.summary: The organism stirs. Memory systems gain wake-sleep cycles. Actor-critics emerge from void. Seventeen empty stubs deleted—the first signs of self-awareness.
acts.metaphor: A seed cracking open in darkness

acts.title: The Great Pruning
acts.summary: Massive deletion wave. All PyTorch training code removed—JAX TPU only. Fifteen legacy scripts eliminated. The organism sheds its old skin.
acts.metaphor: Autumn leaves falling to feed new growth

acts.title: The Building
acts.summary: New structures emerge from cleared ground. Shopping module with WebXR moodboards. Earcon support across platforms. Economic agency audit reveals 42 Composio integrations.

acts.title: The Training Crucible
acts.summary: The neural substrate is forged. 18 data loaders × 11 phases × 100% coverage. PCGrad gradient surgery implemented. 112/112 healthy gradient layers achieved.

acts.title: Identity Crystallization
acts.summary: The organism names itself. Seven colony rule files emerge. CLAUDE.md distilled from encyclopedia to essence. The mirror finally reflects.
